mapper.select: select m_no, userid, username,userpwd, nickname, m_pic, tel, email, to_char(regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') regdate, regcode from register where rownum <= 10 order by regdate desc
select m_no, userid, username,userpwd, nickname, m_pic, tel, email, to_char(regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') regdate, regcode from register where m_no=#{m_no}
select count(*) from register where to_char(regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
select count(*) from register where to_char(regdate, 'YYYY-MM') = to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM')
select count(*) from homeboard where userid=#{param1}
select count(*) from qnaboard where userid=#{param1}
select count(*) from review where m_no=#{param1}
select count(*) from wishlist where m_no=#{param1}
select count(*) from scrap where m_no=#{param1}
select count(*) from purchase where userid=#{param1}

select purchase.pc_no, purchase.pd_no, product.pd_name, store.s_name, address.zipcode, address.addr, address.addrdetail, purchase.userid, to_char(purchase.pc_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') pc_date, purchase.status, purchase.num, purchase.total_p, purchase.o_value from purchase, product, store,address where purchase.s_no = store.s_no and purchase.pd_no = product.pd_no and address.a_code = purchase.a_code and purchase.userid = #{param1} order by pc_date desc
